attributes.action: Ensure all Footballers pay Tax and National Insurance.
attributes.additional_details:
Ensure that all footballers playing for British Football Clubs pay Income Tax and National Insurance rather than avoiding the issue by dubious accountancy practices.

It must be about time that HMRC grew a pair of whatsits and stopped all footballers avoiding paying tax by claiming that they are employed offshore, if they play in this country, why are they not paying in this country.

Come on everyone lets get some momentum behind this issue and stop this obscene £150,000 a week or more charade. If they paid their share of tax then perhaps we wouldn't see all these football clubs collapsing !
